description.lang: Zuper Switch Remote Control 2 GangProduct Name:Zuper SwitchBrand Name:Easy LightProduct Line:Basic ControllerProduct Code:ZUS102EUProduct Version:1.00Product Comment:It works as a remote control to send a command to associated Z-Wave devices up to 232 devices per gang.Battery Type:CR2032Battery Count:2Description:Switch Remote Control 2 GangInclusion Note:Press one of the buttons.Wakeup Note:Press one of the buttons.
